name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdLibSpy - See Spend in FB Ads Library

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UNCOVER Spend and Reach directly inside META Ad Library with AdLibSpy, the must-have Chrome extension for marketers, advertisers,…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UNCOVER Spend and Reach directly inside META Ad Library with AdLibSpy, the must-have Chrome extension for marketers, advertisers, and dropshippers. See exactly how much spend is on an Adset and gain unparalleled insights into the strategies of your competitors and industry leaders with just a click.

🏆🔍 Unlock Winning Products Easily: Discover lucrative products and niches effortlessly, with exact data in the EU on Ad Spend and Reach available at your fingertips.

💰👀 See Ad Spend Instantly: Discover the advertising budgets behind specific creatives, enabling you to make data-driven decisions and optimize your marketing investments for maximum ROI.

🏁 Competitive Intelligence: Stay ahead of the competition by benchmarking your ad performance against industry standards and top competitors, staying one step ahead.

🛠️ Seamless Integration: Effortlessly integrate AdLibSpy into your browsing experience, with lightweight functionality that won't slow you down.

🌟 Success Story: Discovering Winning Products
"AdLibSpy changed the game for my dropshipping business. By seeing the ad spend on specific creatives in the FB ad library, I discovered winning products that catapulted my sales. It's like having a secret weapon in my marketing arsenal. Thanks to AdLibSpy, my business is booming like never before!" - Jack, Dropshipping Entrepreneur
